column4: ok, i have installed wine trough synaptic and the i installed photoshop with wine all without problems, the thing its that when i try to run photoshop in the terminal (wine Photoshop.exe) i get this error and photoshop doesnt starts: fixme:actctx:QueryActCtxW stub!
